com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.validator

Class DateFieldPivotValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.validator.AbstractFieldValidator
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.validator.DateFieldPivotValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FieldValidator, Serializable

    public class DateFieldPivotValidator
extends AbstractFieldValidator
    This class can be used to validate that a WDateField is "before" or "after" a particular "pivot" date. If no pivot date is supplied then "today" is used as the default.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Martin Schevchenko
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int AFTER
      Indicates that the date in the input field must be after the pivot date.
      static int AFTER_OR_EQUAL
      Indicates that the date in the input field must be after or equal to the pivot date.
      static int BEFORE
      Indicates that the date in the input field must be before the pivot date.
      static int BEFORE_OR_EQUAL
      Indicates that the date in the input field must be before or equal to the pivot date.
      static int EQUAL
      Indicates that the date in the input field must be equal to the pivot date.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DateFieldPivotValidator

        public DateFieldPivotValidator()
        Creates a DateFieldPivotValidator. The default validation is that the field must be "before or equal to today".

      • DateFieldPivotValidator

        public DateFieldPivotValidator(int operator)
        Creates a DateFieldPivotValidator. As no "pivot" date is supplied, the operation will be relative to "today".
        Parameters:
        operator - the operator which controls how the dates will be compared. Must be one of BEFORE, BEFORE_OR_EQUAL, EQUAL, AFTER_OR_EQUAL or AFTER.

      • DateFieldPivotValidator

        public DateFieldPivotValidator(int operator,
                       Date pivot)
        Creates a DateFieldPivotValidator which compares against the given fixed date.
        Parameters:
        operator - the operator which controls how the dates will be compared. Must be one of BEFORE, BEFORE_OR_EQUAL, EQUAL, AFTER_OR_EQUAL or AFTER.
        pivot - the date to compare against.

      • DateFieldPivotValidator

        public DateFieldPivotValidator(int operator,
                       WDateField pivot)
        Creates a DateFieldPivotValidator which compares against the a variable date.
        Parameters:
        operator - the operator which controls how the dates will be compared. Must be one of BEFORE, BEFORE_OR_EQUAL, EQUAL, AFTER_OR_EQUAL or AFTER.
        pivot - the date field which will supply the date to compare against.
